segments.text: Hello , this is Mary from the Taipei new station , what can i do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Marry , this is Lin Wang , calling from network .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hi , Mr Wang , who do you wish to speak to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May i speak to David please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Davids who , we have 5 Davids in the office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please hold on a minute , offer your call to Mr Richton .
segments.speaker: S1
